detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined top section.
Velvet choker with a metal fastener and ends. Adjustable length, 30-37 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with reversible sequins on the front and a rounded hem.

Fleece-lined mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Reflective details and an elasticated strap with a press-stud at the wrists, and narrow elastication around the tops. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

V-neck blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a pleated collar and gathers at the shoulders. Decorative covered buttons down the front, a seam at the waist with elastication at the back, and a frill trim at the hem. Long puff sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs.
Fitted, ribbed top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and long sleeves.
Dress and a pair of cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless dress with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt.
Shorts in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and a back pocket.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Push-up bra in lace with contrasting colour details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey an appliqué on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles, fluted underneath.

Blouse in softly draping satin made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Gathers around the neckline and cuffs to create volume and soft draping.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Laptop case in patterned scuba fabric with a chunky zip. Size 26x35 cm. Fits computers up to 13”.
Short dress in waffled jersey with lacing at the top, short raglan sleeves and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a round neckline, vertical seam down the front and wrapover draping at the hem.
Leggings in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Pyjamas in a patterned weave. V-neck top with an open front and ties, short sleeves and frills down the front and at the hem. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.

Fancy dress costume in jersey with a matching mask, a zip and chin guard at the front and a detachable tail with a hook and loop fastener. Mask with elastication at the back and a hook and loop fastener at the front.
Soft, textured-knit jumper with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, gently flared skirt in soft viscose jersey with smocking at the top. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket at the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with plastic studs at the top.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey leggings with wide elastication at the waist.
Braided belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Short, straight dress in jersey with long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Lined bandeau bikini top with a concealed silicone trim at the top and lightly padded cups with removable inserts.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a rounded neckline, long sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a lace detail at the top, low waist, ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Long raglan sleeves with mesh details. Seamless.

Set with three wrapover bodysuits and three pairs of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved bodysuits with a wrapover front and press-studs at the sides and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with ties at the front, and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a tab and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and cuffs with press-studs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.
Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with shoulder straps that have a sewn-on bow. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Suede loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave.

Set with a top and shorts. Top in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with decorative pompoms on the front, short raglan sleeves and elastication around the neckline. Shorts in dobby-weave cotton with elastication at the waist and hems.

Long halterneck dress in woven fabric with a sheen in a narrow cut at the top with pleats at the front. Open section with lace trims at the back, covered buttons at the back of the neck and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Briefs in an airy silk blend with lace sections, an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a resort collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and slits in the sides.
Long, sleeveless dress in mulberry silk with a V-neck at the front and deep V-neck and ties at the back. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Pile-lined all-in-one suit in a sturdy weave. Hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a diagonal zip down the front and one leg with a chin guard at the top and padded foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Platform ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side. Jersey linings made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.

Calf-length dress in twill made from a viscose blend with a collar, buttons down the front and gathered yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and no buttons.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the back, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a flared skirt with patch front pockets.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and decorative buttons down the front.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a double-layered, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, faux fur linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9 cm.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, a print motif on the front and cut-off sleeves with raw, roll edges.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
Purl-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, high-waisted shorts woven in a cotton blend with wide elastication and a frill trim at the top.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Socks in a soft, fine knit with elasticated ribbing at the top.

Windproof jacket in a crisp weave with a high stand-up collar, mesh-lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Chest pockets with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets and one inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Multi-strand necklace in metal with chains in various designs and decorative coin pendants. Adjustable length approx. 37-46 cm.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Sports top in fast-drying thermal fleece with a drawstring hood. Zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Scarf knitted in soft cashmere with narrow ribbed trims on the short sides.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button, and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and buttons at the front. Loose yoke at the back, partial yoke at the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Tab and metal fastener at the cuffs and a single back vent.
